title: Cherry pork with spicy bacon broccoli and sweet potato brown rice
description: Slow cooked chunks of juicy pork belly served with spicy broccoli, sweet rice and a cranberry orange sauce. Amazing!
ingredients: 300g/10½oz red rock sugar (available from specialist Chinese groceries)
400g/14oz sweet potatoes, unpeeled, cut into 1.5cm/¾in chunks
2 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine, or dry sherry
1 large red carrot, sliced in quarters lengthwise, then cut into 5cm/2in pieces at an angle
1 tbsp low sodium light soy sauce
